title: Luminite Hamaxes
summaries: The Luminite Hamaxes are endgame hamaxes, available after the Moon Lord is defeated. The four types are the Solar Flare Hamaxe, the Vortex Hamaxe, the Nebula Hamaxe and the Stardust Hamaxe. All share the same stats.
They require <linked>Luminite</linked> and <linked>Lunar Fragments</linked> to craft, obtainable from the Moon Lord and <linked>Celestial Towers</linked>, respectively.
They have the highest hammer power in the game, along with <linked>The Axe</linked>. They are beaten only by The Axe in axe power, making them the second-strongest axes.
Their best modifier is Legendary. While Light may seem to provide a better speed boost by percentages, rounding reveals that Legendary and Light mine at equal speeds for these tools.

statistics.Sell: 5 GC
